description:
Location: CANOGA PARK, CA, USA

Salary: $25.00 USD Hourly - $34.00 USD Hourly

Description: Our client is currently seeking a Project Coordinator 2

Join our dynamic workplace design and architecture practice. We are seeking a proactive and resourceful Project Coordinator to support our Project Management Teams across various project types.

This Job Will Have The Following Responsibilities

  • Lead initial project setup for diverse project types and sizes.
  • Provide ongoing financial, operational, and administrative support for 20+ projects monthly, valued at approximately $250-300K in revenue.
  • Develop trust with internal teams and clients through attention to detail, proactive problem-solving, and sound judgment.

Key Duties

  • Support proposal development.
  • Set up projects in internal management systems for finance and operations.
  • Manage client and vendor setup.
  • Issue purchase orders and contract agreements.
  • Organize project teams using shared online folders.
  • Complete project charters at kickoff.
  • Track actual and forecasted monthly revenue.
  • Assist with monthly invoicing.
  • Monitor monthly utilization and realization reporting.
  • Ensure smooth information flow for all project phases.
  • Manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Develop project authorization forms, proposals, and contract amendments.
  • Identify efficiencies and establish best practices.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues proactively.
  • Review draft deliverables for quality and accuracy.
  • Utilize project management software for data input and reporting.
  • Attend client meetings, take notes, and follow up on action items.
  • Contribute to case studies and thought leadership.

Qualifications

  • Experience in business, finance, or operations.
  • Excellent communication skills.
  • Driven, proactive, and resourceful.

Contact: valonzo@judge.com

This job and many more are available through The Judge Group. Find us on the web at www.judge.com
